channel.title: Parm Gill
channel.description: Recent news about Parm Gill, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Today our Government announced $45 million in additional humanitarian assistance for conflict-affected Syrians.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Our Government continues to focus on creating jobs. StatsCan announced that +59,200 net new jobs were created in August.
